calls.description: A batch method for creating translations with one http call. To use, pass an array of translations to the method.

A batch method for updating translations with one http call. To use, pass an array of translation objects to the method, including the translationIds. Any properties contained in these objects will be updated. Any properties not contained in the object will retain their values.

properties.name: onlineBookingsId
properties.description: The ID for the booking.

properties.name: heatId
properties.description: The ID of the heat for the booking.

properties.name: productsId
properties.description: The ID of the product for the booking.

properties.name: isPublic
properties.description: The flag indicating whether or not to make this booking available to the online booking interface.

properties.name: quantityTotal
properties.description: The number of available bookings. This must be a positive integer.

properties.name: heatId
properties.description: The ID of the heat for the booking.

properties.name: heatDescription
properties.description: The description of the heat.

properties.name: heatStartsAt
properties.description: The start time for the heat.

properties.name: heatSpotsTotalActual
properties.description: The original total spots for the heat.

properties.name: heatSpotsAvailableCombined
properties.description: The ID of the heat for the booking.

properties.name: heatSpotsAvailableOnline
properties.description: The number of spots intended to be exposed to the online interface for the entire heat.

properties.name: products
properties.description: The container for Products objects.

properties.name: products.onlineBookingsId
properties.description: The ID for the booking.

properties.name: products.price1
properties.description: The price of the product for the booking.

properties.name: products.productDescription
properties.description: The description of the product for the booking.

properties.name: products.productsId
properties.description: The ID of the product for the booking.

properties.name: products.productSpotsAvailableOnline
properties.description: The number of spots intended to be exposed to the online interface for this specific product.

properties.name: products.productSpotsTotal
properties.description: The ID of the heat for the booking.

properties.name: products.productType
properties.description: The ID of the type for the product.

properties.name: firstName
properties.description: The first name on the credit card.

properties.name: lastName
properties.description: The last name on the credit card.

properties.name: number
properties.description: The credit card number.

properties.name: expiryMonth
properties.description: The expiration month for the credit card. Can be 1 or 2-digit.

properties.name: expiryYear
properties.description: The card's 4-digit expiration year.

properties.name: cvv
properties.description: The cvv for the credit card.

properties.name: address1
properties.description: The first address line for the credit card.

properties.name: address2
properties.description: The second address line for the credit card.

properties.name: city
properties.description: The city for the credit card.

properties.name: postcode
properties.description: The post/zip code for the credit card.

properties.name: state
properties.description: The state code for the credit card.

properties.name: country
properties.description: The country code for the credit card.

properties.name: phone
properties.description: The phone number for the credit card.

properties.name: checkDetailsId
properties.description: The ID for the CheckDetails record.

properties.name: checkId
properties.description: The ID of the parent Check. This CheckID must already exist.

properties.name: productId
properties.description: The ID of the product.

properties.name: productName
properties.description: The name for the underlying product.

properties.name: status
properties.description: The status of the CheckDetails.

properties.name: type
properties.description: The type of the CheckDetails.

properties.name: qty
properties.description: The quantity of the product to be added to check details. Either qty or cadetQty must be provided and greater than zero.

properties.name: cadetQty
properties.description: The cadet quantity of the product to be added to check details. Either qty or cadetQty must be provided and greater than zero.

properties.name: createdDate
properties.description: The timestamp indicating when the CheckDetails record was created.

properties.name: paymentId
properties.description: The identifier for the payment.

properties.name: checkId
properties.description: The identifier for the check for the payment.

properties.name: userId
properties.description: The identifier for the user who is accepting the payment.

properties.name: payType
properties.description: The type of the payment.

properties.name: payDate
properties.description: The timestamp at which the payment was accepted.

properties.name: payStatus
properties.description: The status of the payment.

properties.name: payAmount
properties.description: The monetary amount accepted as a payment.

properties.name: payTax
properties.description: The monetary amount applied toward taxes.

properties.name: voidDate
properties.description: The date at which the payment was voided.

properties.name: voidUser
properties.description: The identifier for the user who has voided the payment.

properties.name: voidNotes
properties.description: The notes containing the reason why the payment was voided.

properties.name: voidTerminal
properties.description: The terminal from which the payment was voided.

properties.name: customerId
properties.description: The identifier for the customer.

properties.name: pointHistoryId
properties.description: The id for the point history.

properties.name: customerId
properties.description: The customer id for the point history.

properties.name: checkId
properties.description: The referenced check id for the point history.

properties.name: userId
properties.description: The user id making the change for the point history.

properties.name: pointAmount
properties.description: The change amount for the point history.

properties.name: type
properties.description: The type for the point history.

properties.name: pointDate
properties.description: The date of entry for the point history.

properties.name: pointExpDate
properties.description: The date of expiration for the point history.

properties.name: notes
properties.description: The notes for the point history.

properties.name: refPointHistoryId
properties.description: The previous point history id which is being referenced.

properties.name: ipAddress
properties.description: The ip address from where the point history originated

properties.name: isManual
properties.description: Flag indication as to whether or not the point history was entered manually.

properties.name: checkDetailId
properties.description: The referenced check detail id for the point history.

properties.name: reservationId
properties.description: The referenced reservation id for the point history.

properties.name: username
properties.description: The username for the user making the change for the point history.

properties.name: approvedByUserName
properties.description: The username for the user approving the change for the point history.

properties.name: productId
properties.description: The identifier for the product.

properties.name: productType
properties.description: The type of the product.

properties.name: description
properties.description: The description of the product.

properties.name: price1
properties.description: The default price for the product.

properties.name: taxId
properties.description: The identifier for the tied tax record, if used.

properties.name: productClassId
properties.description: The identifier for the relevant product class record, if used.

properties.name: enabled
properties.description: A flag indication of whether or not the product should be treated as enabled.

properties.name: deleted
properties.description: A flag indication of whether or not the product should be treated as deleted.

properties.name: p_Points
properties.description: On a points product, the quantity of points this product provides.

properties.name: r_Points
properties.description: On a reservation product, the quantity of reservation points this reservation provides.

properties.name: g_Points
properties.description: On a gift card product, the quantity of gift card points this product provides.

properties.name: priceCadet
properties.description: The cadet price of the product.

properties.name: dateCreated
properties.description: The timestamp when the product was created.

properties.name: onlineBookingReservationsId
properties.description: The ID for the reservation.

properties.name: onlineBookingsId
properties.description: The ID of the booking for the reservation.

properties.name: quantity
properties.description: The quantity of reservations to hold. This number must be a positive integer.

properties.name: customersId
properties.description: The ID of the customer for the reservation.

properties.name: sessionId
properties.description: The session ID for the reservation, used for documentation and debugging purposes.

properties.name: onlineBookingReservationStatusId
properties.description: The ID for the status of the reservation. Statuses should be set to permanent while the underlying kart is open, and set to permanent after the purchase has been made.

properties.name: translationsId
properties.description: The ID for the translation.

properties.name: namespace
properties.description: The namespace / application for the translation.

properties.name: name
properties.description: The name of the translation.

properties.name: culture
properties.description: The culture of the translation.

properties.name: defaultValue
properties.description: The default value for the translation.

properties.name: value
properties.description: The current value for the translation.

properties.name: description
properties.description: The description for the translation.

properties.name: created
properties.description: The timestamp of creation for the translation.
